name: typesafe-design
description: A methodology for building a set of utilities to implement 100% custom and type-safe design systems

scripts.clean: lerna clean --yes && lerna exec -- rimraf lib/ dist/
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run bootstrap
scripts.update: npm run check -- -u && npm run bootstrap
scripts.build:presentation: npm run build:ds && npm run build:components && lerna run start --scope=@typesafe-design/presentation --stream
scripts.start:components: npm run build:ds && lerna run start --scope=@typesafe-design/components --stream
scripts.start:components:storybook: npm run build:ds && lerna run storybook --scope=@typesafe-design/components --stream
scripts.start:presentation: npm run build:ds && npm run build:components && lerna run start --scope=@typesafe-design/presentation --stream

author: Drew DeCarme (drew@imaginedelements.com)
